title: [BUG] Could not find an "MLmodel" configuration file at "C:\mlruns\1"
body:
### System information
- **I'm running my Python code on Google Colab using connection to local runtime. I've MLFlow installed using pip install MLFLOW after installing Anaconda3 on my Windows 10 64 bit. My system's Python is 3.7.3, 
Jypyter details:
jupyter core     : 4.5.0
jupyter-notebook : 6.0.0
qtconsole        : 4.5.3
ipython          : 7.7.0
ipykernel        : 5.1.2
jupyter client   : 5.3.1
jupyter lab      : 1.0.2
nbconvert        : 5.5.0
ipywidgets       : 7.5.1
nbformat         : 4.4.0
traitlets        : 4.3.2
 )**:
- **OS Platform: Win10 **:
- **MLflow installed from: pip install mlflow **: 
- **mlflow, version 1.2.0
- **Python version:  3.7.3: 
- **npm version: Not Installed. Using Google Colab ipynb code**:
- **Command: model_load = mlflow.pytorch.load_model('file:///C:/mlruns/1', run_id="bd7d562344444a19822a2397f081fc37")**:

### Problem Description:
\AppData\Local\Continuum\anaconda3\lib\site-packages\mlflow\utils\model_utils.py in _get_flavor_configuration(model_path, flavor_name)
     22                 "Could not find an \"MLmodel\" configuration file at \"{model_path}\"".format(
     23                     model_path=model_path),
---> 24                 RESOURCE_DOES_NOT_EXIST)
     25 
     26     model_conf = Model.load(model_configuration_path)

MlflowException: Could not find an "MLmodel" configuration file at "C:\mlruns\1"

### Code to reproduce issue
Whenever I run model_load = mlflow.pytorch.load_model('file:///C:/mlruns/1', run_id="bd7d562344444a19822a2397f081fc37") code it shows MLFlowException saying couldn't not find an MLmodel configuration file at C:\mlruns\1 despite the folder 1 contains meta.yaml file. The meta.yaml file contains following lines:

artifact_location: file:///C:/mlruns/1
experiment_id: '1'
lifecycle_stage: active
name: <Preyansh>

I've my MLflow installed in: 
C:\Users\pdwivedi26\AppData\Local\Continuum\anaconda3\Scripts\mlflow.exe
Python In:
C:\Users\pdwivedi26\AppData\Local\Continuum\anaconda3\python.exe
Conda In:
C:\Users\pdwivedi26\AppData\Local\Continuum\anaconda3\Library\bin\conda.bat
C:\Users\pdwivedi26\AppData\Local\Continuum\anaconda3\Scripts\conda.exe

I am able to create experiment and access the experiment via MLFlow ui (Due to installation folder difference I've to copy paste my mlrun folder into system32 so as to make it picked by MLFlow UI). But when I try to load mode (after choosing best model Id from MLFlow UI) using mlflow.pytorch.load_model it shows above mentioned issue. 
I've already tried to keep a copy of mlrun folder in System32, \Continuum\anaconda3\Lib\site-packages\mlflow & Continuum\anaconda3\Lib\site-packages\mlflow\utils but nothing works..

Please help by letting me know if any file bug needs to removed or I'm missing anything.

Note: I'm new to python, jupyter etc.
